title: Metro Briefing  New York: Manhattan: 95 Arrested In Gang Sweep
body:
Federal and local officials yesterday announced the arrests of 95 illegal immigrant gang members in the New York 
City area. 

The arrests, including 33 this week, were made during the past four months in New York City and Yonkers and on 
Long Island, the officials said. The defendants will face deportation proceedings, said Martin Ficke, the special 
agent in charge of the United States Immigration and Customs Enforcement's New York City office.   Jennifer 8. 
Lee (NYT)

http://www.nytimes.com
